Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45853 affecting package cloud-hypervisor for versions less than 32.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45853 affecting package cloud-hypervisor for versions less than 32.0-2. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package cloud-hypervisor is earlier than 32.0-2, affected by CVE-2023-45853
